definition: employee/person employed in a trade or profession

pinyin: zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2

definition: those who left China for Taiwan before the founding of PRC in 1949

sentences.english: Many teachers are waiting for new replacements before retiring.
sentences.chinese: 許多教師正在等候新進人員，以便退休。

sentences.english: Reductions in staffing at the major banks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁減人員時的主要銀行。

sentences.english: It's edited by Jahan Ramazani, formerly a Teaching Fellow in this course.
sentences.chinese: 由之前的一個教學人員讓，拉馬紮尼所編。

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰國緝毒部隊的九名人員已被指控犯有謀殺罪。

sentences.english: Researchers could also work to increase the xanthohumol content of hops.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員也能增加蛇麻草中的黃腐酚含量。

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾溫承認工作人員無法用掃描儀監控所有物品。

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授權角色是必不可少的，這些角色上分配了人員。

sentences.english: The raid was conducted with U. S. military personnel assaulting on two helicopters.
sentences.chinese: 實施襲擊的是兩駕直升機上的美國軍方人員。

sentences.english: Officials say new information led to the remains at what is believed to be the crash site.
sentences.chinese: 官方人員稱新信息領導着剩餘的被認爲在撞碎的地方。

sentences.english: Practitioners should be required to log in to the app before it can be used.
sentences.chinese: 從業人員應須在登錄到該應用程序才能使用。

sentences.english: The researchers believe that the findings do apply to humans.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員認爲，這項研究結果也適用於人類。

sentences.english: As a developer, this is what you should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 這就是作爲一個開發人員所需要追求的。

sentences.english: Have reached a shopping direction, sales and customers purchase contract signed.
sentences.chinese: 已達成購物方向後，銷售人員和客戶簽署購銷合同。

sentences.english: All the Arsenal staff and everyone else have helped me.
sentences.chinese: 所有的阿森納工作人員和每一個其他人都在幫助我。

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 爲了模擬原力，技術人員在“克諾比”身上藏了儀器。

sentences.english: Researchers have found a large subpopulation of the insect that prefers to live outside.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現了一種喜歡生活在室外的瘧蚊的亞種。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
